title: Why hardline ERG Tories will end up backing Boris Johnson's Brexit deal
text:
The Brussels tunnel of Brexit negotiations is a dark place. Despite an intensive round of private talks between Boris Johnson and leading Brexiteer Tories, no one knows the precise nature of the deal that Downing Street is increasingly confident will emerge blinking in the light at the summit of EU leaders starting on Thursday.

As one hardline Brexieteer put it: “We are longing for this to work but nobody is committed yet either way – to backing it or opposing it.”

But that has not stopped a storm of speculation about the likely response from the 80-strong ERG, of whom around 30 are so-called Spartans because they three times voted down Theresa May’s Withdrawal Agreement.

Reports are rife of...
description: The Brussels tunnel of Brexit negotiations is a dark place.
